name: Personal FrynAnts
description:
Made for the GMTK Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together"

This is a local co-op game. One player uses the A & D keys  to move the purple ant and the other uses the Left and Right Arrow keys to move the orange ant. Together, they have to deliver french fries to ant colonies and return with money to get fries for the remaining colonies. They must avoid bumping into snakes or being stepped on.  (There are 3 levels and in each level they must deliver 3 fries. )

Only one player can move at a time. The moving player rotates around the other player as a pivot. Either player can press space to switch which player can move and which player is the pivot. 

The in game controls/tutorials were rushed, so for more clarification, while the A key and Left Arrow key move counter-clockwise and the D and Right Arrow key  move clockwise, the controls could also be described as:

D - moves the purple ant forward

A - moves the purple ant backwards

RIGHT - moves red ant forward

LEFT - moves red ant backwards

SPACE - switches which ant can move
